required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes With a New Monofocal IOL Enhanced for Intermediate Vision
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Outcomes With a New Monofocal Intraocular Lens Enhanced for Intermediate Vision

brief_summary.textblock: phacoemulsification with insertion of EYHANCE IOL to improve near and intermediate vision

detailed_description.textblock: insertion of new intraocular lens enhanced for intermediate vision

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: patients undergoing cataract surgery are managed with phacoemulsification and insertion of Eyehance intraocular lens in order to improve their intermediate vision.

primary_outcome.description: Standardized logarithm of the minimum angle of resolution (logMAR) charts were used for visual acuity measurement at 80 cm .
Standardized logarithm of the minimum angle of resolution (logMAR) charts were used for visual acuity measurement at 40 cm.

secondary_outcome.description: The curve was obtained while the patient wearing his distance correction to provide the best distance visual acuity in both eyes. The test was performed under photopic conditions (85 candelas/m2) using ETDRS charts at a distance of 4m with the introduction of defocusing lenses from +1.00 D to -4.00 D in 0.50 D steps.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Assessment of intermediate vision, defocus curve
arm_group.description: Standardized logarithm of the minimum angle of resolution (logMAR) charts were used for visual acuity measurement at 4 m, 80 cm, and 40 cm. he binocular defocus curve: The binocular defocus curve was done to evaluate the functional range of vision. The curve was obtained while the patient wearing his distance correction to provide the best distance visual acuity in both eyes. The test was performed under photopic conditions (85 candelas/m2) using ETDRS charts at a distance of 4m with the introduction of defocusing lenses from +1.00 D to -4.00 D in 0.50 D steps.

intervention.description: phacoemulsification with implantation of EYEHANCE IOL
intervention.arm_group_label: Assessment of intermediate vision, defocus curve

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- normal ocular examination apart from cataract.
Exclusion Criteria:
- previous ocular surgery.
- ocular pathology or corneal abnormalities.
- endothelial cell count below 2000 cells/mm2.
- corneal astigmatism greater than 1.0 diopter (D) measured with Scheimpflug tomography (Sirius, CSO, Italy).
